snippet: Sergei Bobrovsky earned his second shutout in three games as Columbus defeated the Islanders, 4-0, and moved 3 points ahead of the Devils and Toronto in the wild-card race.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Columbus Blue Jackets defeat New York Islanders, 4-0; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Sergei Bobrovsky earned his second shutout in three games as Columbus defeated the Islanders, 4-0, and moved 3 points ahead of the Devils and Toronto in the wild-card race.

headline.main: Blue Jackets’ Victory Is Bad News for Devils
headline.print_headline: Blue Jackets’ Victory Is Bad News for Devils
